Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45803 affecting package python-pip for versions less than 24.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45803 affecting package python-pip for versions less than 24.2-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-pip is earlier than 24.2-1, affected by CVE-2023-45803
